Constructs a test logger interface. 

By default the logger has no defined outputs.

Adds a file output for writing. 


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em path} & Full path to the file to write to. This path does not need to exist beforehand. \\
\hline
{\em format} & The format to write to the file in. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\hypertarget{classchaos_1_1test_1_1_test_logger_a187403a01b59676a955817fa39bafbbb}{}\index{chaos\+::test\+::\+Test\+Logger@{chaos\+::test\+::\+Test\+Logger}!add\+Std\+Out@{add\+Std\+Out}}

\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf Out\+Format}}]{format}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}\label{classchaos_1_1test_1_1_test_logger_a187403a01b59676a955817fa39bafbbb}


Adds a standard output for writing. 

\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
Currently writing to only one standard output is supported. Calling this function multiple times will result in an exception. T\+O\+D\+O\+:
\end{DoxyWarning}

\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em format} & The format to write standard output in. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
